item.title: ADHD services are stopping taking on new patients as they struggle to cope with demand, the BBC finds. "We'll be looking closely at the recommendations from the taskforce so we can continue to make real improvements to the support and services available”,

item.title: Virginia Giuffre is the woman whose testimony brought down a prince. In an interview in 2019, she accused the then Prince Andrew of abusing her. BBC Panorama has now released some previously unseen footage from her interview. #PrinceAndrew #AndrewMountba
